data.title: Siege of Orléans: Joan of Arc - Medieval Kingdoms Total War 1212AD Mod Gameplay
data.description:
The year is 1429, and the french have been sieging Orléans for 6 month now.  The English defenses show no sign of falter.  Orléans is a very important city and must be conquered to win the war.  But soon Joan of Arc arrives, and 9 days later the city was captured and the french were victories.  But we have gone back in time, will history change?  Enjoy the Battle :D

UtiPlayer: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC-72TRVjrj8EKBrZEg7sjFg


If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D

data.title: Epic Siege Battle Tactics: Arena Combat - Formata Gameplay
data.description:
Formata Gameplay!
Today we are playing a new game called Formata.  It is a blend of Mount & Blade and Total War.  It is still in early access and only 10 dollars on steam.  In this battle there are 3 teams, yellow, Green, and Red.  You have to destroy the enemies fort to achieve victory!  Enjoy the Battle :D

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D

data.title: Brave Knights of Castile: Battle to the Last - Medieval Kingdoms Total War 1212AD Mod Gameplay
data.description:
We finally see a new faction, the Kingdom of Castile!  We will see them in action in a 1v1 online Pitched battle.  Their enemy for today is the Latin Empire.  Enjoy the Battle :D

Medieval Kingdoms Total War 1212AD is a mod for Total War: Attila.

data.title: Battle of Weather Hills: Fall of Amon Sûl - Third Age Total War Gameplay
data.description:
BATTLE STARTS AT: 7:47
In T.A. 1409 a great host issued from Angmar and invaded Cardolan and took Weathertop. A remnant of the Dúnedain of Cardolan held out in the Barrow-downs and the Old Forest. The last prince of Cardolan was interred in the Barrow-downs in this year When the forces of Angmar reached Weathertop they besieged it, until they broke through. The attackers subsequently burned, then razed the fortress to the ground. King Arveleg I was killed, but some of the Dúnedain retreated and escaped with the Palantír that was stationed there. 

This is a custom Battle made by PaladinBob.

Third Age Total War is a mod for Medieval 2 Total War.  Its is based on Lord of the Rings.

Detailed Description of the battle: http://www.mediafire.com/file/51dej2d3c8ws77e/weather+hills+background.txt



If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D

data.title: STAR WARS Shenanigans: Battle for Hoth - Bear Force 2 Mod Gameplay
data.description:
Welcome to another Call to Arms Event.  This time we are battling for Hoth.  And then we settle it with an epic Jedi/Sith Battle!  The Knights of Apollo are fighting as the Empire, and Lionheart is fighting as the Rebels.  Enjoy the Battle :D  

Mod Link: http://www.moddb.com/mods/star-wars-bear-force-ii

Lionheart's Channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/lionheartx10

HOW TO JOIN CALL TO ARMS - 
Mount and Blade Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/user?u=3830559

data.title: Battle of Antietam: Cornfield - North & South: American Civil War Mod Gameplay
data.description:
Welcome to Part 1 of my 3 part series on the Battle of Antietam.  The Bloodiest Single day battle in the American Civil War. Its is 5am and gen. Hooker leads his men against Lee's Left flank.  Enjoy the Battle :D

North & South: American Civil War is a mod for Napoleon Total War

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D

data.title: Battle for Mountain Pass: Elven Alliance - Third Age Total War Mod Gameplay
data.description:
The Silvan Elves and High Elves prepare for a great battle!  With the support of the Free Peoples of Eriador, they get ready to fight Isengard, Rhun, and Harad.  This is a battle for the great Mountain Pass!  Enjoy the Battle

In this battle we use the Third Age: Reforge sub mod for Third Age Total War.  Third Age is a mod for Medieval 2 Total War.

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D

data.title: WW1 Germany Invades Belgium: Summer 1914 - The Great War Total War Mod Gameplay
data.description:
Germany plans to attack Paris and surprise the French by marching through neutral territory.  On August 2, 1914 Germany asked for right of passage through Belgium, but Belgium said no.  On August 4th Germany declares war on Belgium.  The Belgians prepare there defenses!  Enjoy the World War One Battle :D

The Great War is a Mod for Napoleon Total War.

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D

data.title: Attack of the Mongols: Defense of Eastern Europe - Medieval Kingdoms Total War 1212AD Mod Gameplay
data.description:
BATTLE STARTS AT: 8:17
The Mongol horde is on the march to conquer eastern Europe.  The Kingdom of Jerusalem and the Kingdom Bohemia rally a force to meet the mongol horde.  But will it be enough?  Enjoy the Battle :D

Medieval Kingdoms Total War 1212AD is a mod for Total War: Attila

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D

data.title: Battle of Antietam: Burnside's Bridge - North & South: American Civil War Mod Gameplay
data.description:
BATTLE STARTS AT: 6:23
The final part of the battle of Antietam is here!  We now look at the southern part of the battlefield.  Gen. Brunside attempts to cross a strategic bridge with 12,500 troops.  But the CSA prepares to hold, hoping that reinforcements will arrive.  Enjoy the battle :D 

Battle of Antietam:
Part 1 - Cornfield - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WD-qH6Q61cE
Part 2 - Sunken Road - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JvvtEKGsjCg
Part 3 - Burnside's Bridge - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=00Fauaw9fkc

Join my Company on War of Rights: https://warofrights.com/
- Remember to go to Company Tool - Sign up and join 24th GA Company B

War of Rights Steam Group - https://steamcommunity.com/groups/warofrights

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D

data.title: Siege of Minas Tirith: Battle of Pelennor Fields - Third Age Total War Mod Gameplay
data.description:
BATTLE STARTS AT: 2:07
The greatest battles of our time is under way.  Gondor defends Minas Tirith to the last man against the forces of Mordor.  Rohan must arrive with reinforcements before it is too late.  Welcome to the siege of Minas Tirith! Enjoy the Battle :D

This battle used the Third Age SubMod Third Age: Reforged!  

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D

data.title: Battle of the Alamo: Texas Revolution - North & South: First Manassas Mod Gameplay
data.description:
Remember the Alamo! Today in this call to arms event we are going to recreate the battle of the Alamo using the Mount and blade: Napoleonic Wars mod North & South: First Manassas.  The Knights of Apollo Represent the Texans and Lionheart's team will me fighting as the Mexicans.  Enjoy the Battle! 

Oasis Hosting Discount Code: https://oasis-hosting.net/gameservers/mbwb/?discountCode=pa2017

Call to Arms Info:
LEARN MORE ABOUT CALL TO ARMS - 
Mount and Blade Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/user?u=3830559
